data.name: Three kingdoms story: Conussia - Complete rework
data.detailed_description:
MORE ABOUT CONUSSIA:

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1398070/The_Book_of_Bondmaids/


About the Game

This is a complete rework of Three kingdoms story:Conussia.

DLC includes following features:

- Animations
- The new UI
- Reworks characters interaction (dialogs)
- The new backgrounds
- Extended story of Tally, Priest and Carpenter
- Extended scenes with Princess, Firefly, Violet and Elsa
- Two new bondmaids in Catacombs
- Two new characters in Monastery
- Translation into Chinese

data.short_description: This is a complete rework of Three kingdoms story:Conussia.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows XP/Vista/7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E4500 2.2GHz / AMD Athlon 64 X2 Dual Core 5000+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 3850 or NVIDIA GeForce 8800 GS
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Supporting DirectX
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows XP/Vista/7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad Q9650 3.0GHz / AMD Phenom II X4 970
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 4850 or NVIDIA GeForce GTX 260
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Supporting DirectX

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.5
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E4500 2.2GHz / AMD Athlon 64 X2 Dual Core 5000+
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 3850 or NVIDIA GeForce 8800 GS
  • Sound Card: Supporting DirectX
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Linux Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E4500 2.2GHz / AMD Athlon 64 X2 Dual Core 5000+
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 3850 or NVIDIA GeForce 8800 GS
  • Sound Card: Supporting DirectX
